full_text: Knitted hat and scarf in DROPS Air. The piece is worked in rib. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ See the ALMOND WHISPER SCARF pattern here ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #almondwhisperset DROPS Design: Pattern ai-539 Yarn group C or A + A WHOLE SET : SIZES : S/M - M/L - L/XL YARN FOR WHOLE SET : DROPS AIR from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group C) 250-250-250 g colour 55, Light Beige HAT : SIZES : S/M - M/L - L/XL Fits head circumference: 54/56 – 56/58 - 58/60 cm YARN FOR HAT : DROPS AIR from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group C) 100-100-100 g colour 55, Light Beige NEEDLES FOR HAT : DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 4 MM: Length 40 cm. DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 4 MM. The technique MAGIC LOOP can be used – you then only need 80 cm circular needle. KNITTING TENSION FOR HAT : 19 stitches in width and 25 rows in height with stocking stitch on needle size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm. NOTE: Needle size is only a guide. If you get too many stitches within 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. If you get too few stitches within 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
